Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton, then resume their normal route on Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Belmont/Harding
ShortDescription: Eastbound  77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Kimball and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Harding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Kimball and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Harding.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
